Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Establishes merit time allowance credits and certain administrative privileges credits for local correctional facilities
Summary: Establishes merit time allowance credits for local correctional facilities for eligible inmates.
LawCode: Add Art 24-A §§810 - 813, Cor L; amd §70.30, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law and the penal law, in relation to establishing merit time allowance credits for local correctional facilities
